item.description:
7-9pm $20 This special event features Erik Harris and John Odlum. Your journey will begin by applying essences and then Erik will guide us into simple Qi Gong exercises, allowing for movement of energy through the body. This will aide in helping you to be more open for the meditation experience. John will guide us onto a magical journey with the essences of plants and trees. This will be accompanied by soothing music, drumming, vocal toning, crystals, and energy healing. This beautiful journey will help you access profound inner wisdom and integrate that knowledge to become more empowered and fulfilled in your life.
Don't miss this amazing opportunity! Register today with John odlum at
www.tru-elements.com or Erik at chiforhealing.com
item.name: Qi Gong Essence Meditation
